de.arm.bot.model

Class Cell

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.arm.bot.model.Cell

  • public class Cell
extends java.lang.Object
    A class representing a cell of the maze
    Author:
    Team ARM

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.Map<Direction,Cell> neighbours
      A map of all neighbours of the cell, mapped as Direction to Cell
      private Status status
      The current status of the cell
      private boolean visited
      Indicates whether the cell was visited before
      private int x
      The x-coordinate of the maze
      private int y
      The y-coordinate of the maze

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Cell(int x, int y, java.util.Map<Direction,Cell> neighbours)
      The default constructor for the class cell Additionally to setting all attributes it links all neighbour cells
      Cell(int x, int y, java.util.Map<Direction,Cell> neighbours, Status status)
      The constructor used on Level 2 for a cell when its status is known.

     int y,
     java.util.Map<Direction,Cell> neighbours)
        The default constructor for the class cell Additionally to setting all attributes it links all neighbour cells

        x - The current x-coordinate of the cell
        y - The current y-coordinate of the cell
        neighbours - A map of all neighbour cells of the current cell
        See Also:
        PrimitiveStatus

      • Cell

        Cell(int x,
     int y,
     java.util.Map<Direction,Cell> neighbours,
     Status status)
        The constructor used on Level 2 for a cell when its status is known. Otherwise acts lice the normal constructor
        Parameters:
        x - The current x-coordinate of the cell
        y - The current y-coordinate of the cell
        neighbours - A map of all neighbour cells of the current cell
        status - The status of the cell

      • hasFinishNearby

        public boolean hasFinishNearby()
        Checks whether there is a FINISH cell nearby this cell. Only used by the Level 1 algorithm
        Returns:
        True if one of the neighbour cells of this cell is a FINISH cell
        See Also:
        PrimitiveStatus

      • hasUndiscoveredNearby

        boolean hasUndiscoveredNearby()
        Checks whether there is a NOT_DISCOVERED cell nearby this cell. Used to find goal cells for the bot to move towards
        Returns:
        True if one of the neighbour cells of this cell is a NOT_DISCOVERED cell

        Returns:
        True if the conditions are met
